data.question: When will the site be created?
answer: The time it takes to make a website depends on the package you choose.
For instance, a landing page or a website constructed by a constructor can be completed within a span of one week.
The multipage site, which has the capability to add new pages in the admin panel, is written manually, resulting in a construction time of approximately 2 to 3 weeks.
A custom e-commerce site or software takes about 3+ weeks to build.
It is also important to consider the efficiency of the client (how much time it takes to agree on the developed design, prepare comments, and collect materials for the site).

data.question: Can I edit the site myself?
answer: Yes, sure. You will have access to the CMS, which has a very easy-to-understand interface that doesn't require any special knowledge. For e-commerce sites, we use our admin panel, which you can customize to your needs. You can create new products, manage them, and analyze them.

data.question: What distinguishes you from other website builders?
answer: Foys is an IT company that specializes in digitalizing business. We develop a website for you while you organize your business. We launch the website, keep it up, watch its progress, give advice, and teach people how to use it. Furthermore, we are always in touch, you can call us by phone or write on a channel that is convenient for you.
The site is launched on a fully functional platform, with ample opportunities for site development and regular updates. You can edit the site independently as well.

data.question: Who will be the owner of the site?
answer: You will be the owner of the developed site design, site address (domain), graphic and textual information posted on the site.
